title: How does one actually get into Bronze 5.
body:
Im going to embark on a wild expedition into the deep dark territories of bronze 5. Yes you heard me, ill bring a camera crew to capture all the RAW, UNEDITED MADNESS THAT LIES WITHIN. 

No seriously, i tried to lose all 10 of my provisional games, lost 8 of them and got into bronze 1.

I know bronze 5 is bad, but i want to see it for myself.

Any tips other than intent feeding, i dont do that.
